definitions.definition: Doctrine of preordination ; doctrine of absolute decrees; doctrine that God acts in an absolute manner.
definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the mid 18 century.

definitions.definition: The principles or practice of absolute or arbitrary government; Synonym of despotism .
definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the early 19 century.

definitions.definition: Belief in a metaphysical absolute ; belief in Absolute .
definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the late 19 century.

definitions.definition: Positiveness ; the state of being absolute.
The characteristic of being absolute in nature or scope; absoluteness .

main_definition: ( theology ) Doctrine of preordination ; doctrine of absolute decrees; doctrine that God acts in an absolute manner. [First attested in the mid 18 century.]
secondary_definitions: ( political science , sociology ) The principles or practice of absolute or arbitrary government; Synonym of despotism . [First attested in the early 19 century.]
( philosophy ) Belief in a metaphysical absolute ; belief in Absolute . [First attested in the late 19 century.]
Positiveness ; the state of being absolute.
( rare ) The characteristic of being absolute in nature or scope; absoluteness .
